attributes.action: Ensure the Climate Bill includes an annual target to reduce greenhouse gas emissions, not a 5 year target.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To tackle climate change, we need an annual goal that the government can be held accountable for, just a like business is to its shareholders at the end of each year.

The proposed Climate Bill seeks 5 year targets which conveniently fall outside the term of a typical government.

As we have as little as 10 years to make the significant progress required to tackle global warming, we need annual targets as a minimum.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
